alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dutchess County through 245 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hopewell Junction, or 8 miles east of Poughkeepsie, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways and in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Pleasant Valley, Wappingers Falls, Millbrook, Hopewell Junction, Red Oaks Mill, Myers Corner, Wingdale, East Fishkill, Beekman, Stormville, Salt Point, Knapps Corner, South Dover, Hoxie Corner, New Hamburg, Clove Valley, Poughquag, Billings and Pleasant Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
